summary: Zepbound Q3 2025 global revenue was $3,588.1M. Historical quarterly trajectory shows strong growth but decelerating sequential gains. Q4 2025 estimate centered at $4,000-4,300M based on multiple approaches.
content:
Historical Zepbound global revenue (millions USD):
Q1 2024: $517.4, Q2 2024: $1,243.3, Q3 2024: $1,257.8, Q4 2024: $1,907.2
Q1 2025: $2,311.9, Q2 2025: $3,381.4, Q3 2025: $3,588.1

Key data points:
- Q3 2025 US Zepbound: $3,570M, International: ~$18M
- Lilly 2025 guidance raised to $63.0-63.5B after Q3
- YoY growth rates: Q1 347%, Q2 172%, Q3 185%
- Sequential growth: Q2→Q3 only +6.1%, Q3→Q4 2024 was +51.6%
- Barchart (Jan 13, 2026): Analysts expect Q4 2025 EPS of $7.47
- Full year 2024 Zepbound: $4,925.7M, Q1-Q3 2025: $9,281.4M

Multiple estimation approaches converge on $3,800-4,500M range for Q4 2025
